name: Publii
title: getpublii.com
shortDescription: Publii offers an open-source static CMS designed for creating fast, secure, and compliant websites easily. It's tailored for users who need a privacy-focused solution without the complexities of dynamic servers. Ideal for bloggers, small businesses, and developers, Publii simplifies website creation with one-click deployment and customizable themes.
pros: GDPR & CCPA compliance for enhanced privacy
cons: Limited to static sites, no dynamic content
Less flexibility compared to full CMS platforms
Requires some technical knowledge for setup

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Hugo
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Fast and flexible static site generator
